title: Public User Profile Wireframe
description: Displays the user's Steam accolades and gaming achievements in a public profile format.

components.name: Header
components.description: Includes logo, navigation links, and search bar.

components.name: Profile Picture
components.description: Displays the user's avatar or profile picture.

components.name: User Details
components.description: Displays the user's name, gamer tags, and linked accounts.

components.name: Achievement Section
components.description: Displays the user's gaming accolades and achievements.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Contains links to privacy policy, terms of service, and contact information.
